TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CustomPeerResolverService extends System.Object implements class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.IPeerResolverContract

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("PeerChannel feature is obsolete and will be removed in the future.", false)

summary.span: 提供自訂對等解析程式服務的基本實作。

span.span: Provides a basic implementation of a custom peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別定義自訂對等解析程式服務的基本實作，並且提供查詢解析的能力，可以將註冊 ID 解析成此解析程式所維護之網狀結構內的對等端點位址。The class defines the base implementation of a custom peer resolver service and provides lookup for the resolution of registration IDs to peer endpoint addresses within the mesh maintained by this resolver.

para.span: 自訂對等解析程式的實作器應該衍生自此類別，並且覆寫這些實作器針對其提供自訂實作的特定函式。

span.span: Implementers of custom peer resolvers should derive from this class and override those specific functions for which they are providing custom implementations.

para.span: 任何自訂對等解析程式都至少必須實作 介面

span.span: Any custom peer resolver must minimally implement the interface.

para.span: 此外，使用自訂解析程式的用戶端必須設定用戶端伺服器延遲時間的上限，才能順利重新整理用戶端向對等解析程式服務的註冊狀態。

span.span: Also, clients using a custom resolver must have some upper bound on client-server latency in order to successfully refresh their registration with the peer resolver service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別預設的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定週期性時間長度。經過這段時間之後，過時的項目會從對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表刪除。

span.span: Gets or sets the recurring length of time after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

value.span: 指定時間間隔的 。經過這段時間之後，過時的項目會從對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表刪除。

span.span: that specifies the time interval after which stale entries are deleted from the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須在對等解析程式服務之前設定，而且不能為零。This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. 預設間隔為 1 分鐘。The default interval is 1 minute. 這個值必須小於 的值，以避免對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中出現過時項目。This value must be less than the value of to avoid the occurrence of stale entries in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

exception.span: 間隔為零或大於 。

span.span: The interval is either zero or greater than .

exception.span: 已在呼叫 之後嘗試設定屬性。

span.span: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫此方法時，會根據 屬性的設定值，排定第一次的註冊查閱資料表清除作業。When this method is called, it schedules the first registration lookup table cleanup based on the value set for the property.

exception.span: 或 設定的時間間隔為 0。

span.span: or are set to a time span interval of 0.

exception.span: 服務已透過前一次呼叫此方法來啟動。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshResponseInfo Refresh(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RefreshInfo refreshInfo) cil managed

param.name: refreshInfo
param.span: 物件，其中包含項目的網狀結構 ID 和註冊 ID，可在對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中重新整理。

span.span: object that contains the mesh ID and the registration ID of the entry to refresh in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

summary.span: 重新整理對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中某項目的過期狀態。

span.span: Refreshes the expiry of an entry in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

returns.span: ，其中包含重新整理後的註冊項目。

span.span: that contains the newly refreshed registration entry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重新整理項目可延長該項目保持有效的時間長度。A refresh of an entry extends the length of time for which it remains valid. 在提供給此方法的 物件中，必須提供用來唯一識別項目的所有資訊。All information used to uniquely identify the entry must be supplied in the object supplied to this method.

exception.span: 設定為 null。

span.span: is set to null.

exception.span: 自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 來啟動。

span.span: The custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 取得或設定時間長度，對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中的項目會在這段時間內保持有效。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

value.span: 指定時間長度的 ，對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中的項目會在這段時間內保持有效。

span.span: that specifies the length of time that entries remain valid in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性必須在對等解析程式服務之前設定，而且不能為零。This property must be set before the peer resolver service has been and must not be zero. 預設間隔為 2 分鐘。The default interval is 2 minutes. 對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表中的指定項目，在經過提供給此屬性的時間長度後，會標記為要刪除。When the amount of time supplied to this property has passed for a given entry in a peer resolver service's registration lookup table, that entry is marked for deletion. 到達 屬性中指定的間隔時，便會進行刪除。The delete occurs when interval specified in the property occurs. 例如，如果這個屬性設定為 10 分鐘，註冊查閱資料表中的項目就會在經過這段間隔後變成過時狀態，並且標記為要刪除。For example, if this property is set to a timespan of 10 minutes, entries in the registration lookup table will become stale and marked for deletion after the interval has passed. 因此，對等解析程式用戶端必須每隔十分鐘更新一次，以避免其項目遭到刪除。As a result, the peer resolver client must update every ten minutes to avoid having their entry deleted.

exception.span: 間隔為零或大於 。

span.span: The interval is either zero or greater than .

exception.span: 已在呼叫 之後嘗試設定屬性。

span.span: An attempt to set the property was made after a call to .

summary.span: 向自訂對等解析程式服務註冊對等。

span.span: Registers a peer with the custom peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要註冊特定網狀結構中的對等節點，必須將格式正確的 物件提供給此方法的其中一個多載。To register a peer node in a specific mesh, a correctly-formed object must be supplied to one of the overloads for this method. 這個物件包含註冊要求註冊之註冊項目所需的特定詳細資訊，包括可唯一識別註冊項目的 GUID、網狀結構 ID 和端點位址。This object contains the specific details necessary to register the registration entry requesting registration, including a GUID that uniquely identifies the registration entry, the mesh ID, and an endpoint address.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterResponseInfo Register(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.RegisterInfo registerInfo) cil managed

param.name: registerInfo
param.span: ，其中包含要向對等解析程式服務註冊之註冊項目的相關資訊。

span.span: that contains information about the registration entry to register with the peer resolver service.

summary.span: 將新的項目加入至對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表。

span.span: Adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service.

returns.span: ，其中包含加入至對等解析程式服務之註冊查閱資料表的項目複本。

span.span: that contains a copy of the entry added to the peer resolver service's registration lookup table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會將新的項目加入至對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表。This method adds a new entry to the registration lookup table of the peer resolver service. 請注意，在服務關閉後進行的註冊都無效，解析要求不會傳回這些項目。Note that registrations made after the service is closed have no effect -- these entries are not returned by resolve requests.

exception.span: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 來啟動。

span.span: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .

exception.span: 提供給此方法的 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

span.span: The object supplied to this method was either null or not correctly formed.

exception.span: 提供給 參數之物件的 AddressInfo 屬性為 null。

span.span: The AddressInfo property of the object supplied to the parameter was null.

exception.span: 提供給此方法的 值設定為 null。

span.span: The value supplied to this method is set to null.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveResponseInfo Resolve(class System.ServiceModel.PeerResolvers.ResolveInfo resolveInfo) cil managed

param.name: resolveInfo
param.span: ，其中包含註冊項目的相關資訊，對等解析程式服務將查詢該項目的已知端點。

span.span: that contains information on the registration entry for which endpoints, if known, are to be looked up by the peer resolver service.

summary.span: 傳回註冊項目已知端點的清單。

span.span: Returns a list of known endpoints for a registration entry.

returns.span: ，其中包含查閱資料表中註冊項目的端點，這個資料表會比對 參數中所提供的資訊。

span.span: that contains the endpoints for the registration entry in the lookup table that matches the information supplied in the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會根據 物件中提供的資料查詢註冊項目，並傳回任何在對等解析程式服務的註冊查閱資料表中找到的對應端點位址。This method looks up a registration entry based on the data supplied in a object and returns any corresponding endpoint addresses found in the peer resolver service's registration lookup table. 傳回的端點位址數目會等於或小於 物件上設定的 屬性值。The number of endpoint addresses returned is equal to or less than the value of the property set on the object.

exception.span: 物件為 null 或格式不正確。

span.span: The object is null or is not correctly formed.

exception.span: 具有相同 GUID 的註冊項目已經存在查閱資料表中，或是自訂對等解析程式服務尚未透過前一次呼叫 來啟動。

span.span: A registration entry with the same GUID already exists in the lookup table, or the custom peer resolver service has not been started with a previous call to .
